alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 9:47PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM MDT... At 947 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Buckhorn, or 17 miles southeast of Sundance, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moskee around 950 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 188 and 202. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
